title: Child's Play
description: THREE STRIKES AND YOU’RE OUT…FOREVER!Crandall, New York—a sleepy little town, as American as apple pie and baseball. Nothing unusual about it…except the Crandall Giants, national Little League champions for two years running, and the town’s only claim to fame. The young players on the team are possessed with an unshakable will to win. Nothing wrong with that, except they have an almost uncanny concentration, and there’s something creepy about their eyes…Baseball in Crandall isn’t just a game. It’s serious business. Dead serious.Sal Conte’s '80s horror classic is now available as an eBook with an all-new forward by the author.
author: Sal Conte
